Body:

Thank You,
Hank Emery

- Hank Emery will send "The Week" when it becomes available.

draft_reply:

Thank you for sending the Monday, September 24th edition of "First Edition" from CS First Boston Research. I look forward to receiving "The Week" when it becomes available.

Best regards,
Unknown

Thanks

Subject: Civil War Weekend
Body:
Hello there fellow Fraters:
I 'm just wishing you all the best on this weekends Civil
War.  I hope to see and speak with as many of you as
possible this weekend whether at the game or at good old
Clodfelters.  As for the Alumni donation, I guess we are
almost there.  If you haven't given but have been
considering it, let Dustin or I (Rich T771) know.  If you
haven't considered it yet, then maybe you could start?
Thank you for your time and Go Beavs.

Rich Roskopf      ffitness@uswest.net
summary:
- Rich Roskopf (T771) wishes everyone well for the Civil War weekend.
- He encourages attendance at the game or Clodfelters.
- Alumni donations are almost complete; donors should contact Rich or Dustin.
draft_reply:
Dear Rich Roskopf,

Thank you for the update and the well wishes for the Civil War game. I appreciate the reminder regarding the Alumni donation and will certainly consider contributing. I look forward to the opportunity to connect with you and other Fraters, potentially at Clodfelters. Go Beavs!

Sincerely,

Unknown

Subject: RE: test
Body:
Dave,

Take a look at this before you pass it on.  I haven't looked
at it in a while.  Let me know if you get it and how it looks.

Thanks,

Kevin



-----Original Message-----
From: dmclolinger@aep.com [mailto:dmclolinger@aep.com]
Sent: Thursday, November 08, 2001 4:18 PM
To: Ruscitti, Kevin
Subject: test


test

Dave
summary:
- Kevin asks Dave to review an item before passing it on.
- Kevin hasn't reviewed the item recently.
- Kevin requests Dave to confirm receipt and provide feedback.
- Dave sent an email with the subject "test" to Kevin on November 08, 2001.
draft_reply:
Dear Dave,

I received your email and the attached document. I will review it and let you know if I have any questions or concerns. Thank you for passing it along.

Regards,

Unknown
